title: # 433 - Annie Lederman & ME
description:
Today I sit down with comedian Annie Lederman. We talk about Whitney’s Sumer camp, sober October, anxiety, being fat shamed, everyone moving to Texas and much more!

This episode is also brought to you by Whoop. Go to http://www.Whoop.com and use the Code “Bert” at checkout to save 15%. 

This episode is also brought to you by Fiverr. Go to https://www.fiverr.com and use code “Bertcast” for 10% off your first order
